resources.string: To chat with contacts from your device open Settings and enable Contacts.
After recording double-tap to send. To discard the recording scrub left-right with two fingers.
No internet connection, can\'t log in to your server.
The audio file cannot be played.
To take photos, capture videos or use the QR-Code scanner, open the system settings and enable \"Camera\".
